rdf:Description.dc:title: Art 11 1991
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Education.
Alberta. Distance Learning.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Module 1. Artifacts convey different themes, meanings, beliefs, and values--Module 2. Artifacts are used for describing and recording--Module 3. Artifacts enhance our way of living--Module 4. Artists' styles affect the character of artifacts--Module 5. Art media affect the creation of artifacts--Module 6. Understanding artifacts gives meaning to art--Module 7. Interpreting and responding to art--Learning facilitator's manual (2 vol.).
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Art appreciation
Antiquities
Art
